main event: A resident of Millstone, New Jersey observed a bright, pulsing light in the sky on May 20, 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as having a color combination of green and white., The light went out and reappeared during the sighting., The sighting lasted for about 7 minutes., It was determined there was no radar contact with the object., The sighting was likely attributed to a balloon or a reflection from an antenna.
